sentences.en: This was Rapunzel, who in her solitude passed her time in letting her sweet voice resound.
sentences.cn: 这就是莴苣姑娘，她在孤独中让自己甜美的声音回响，以此来消磨时光。

sentences.en: His resounding voice continued to resound in my ears long after he was out of sight.
sentences.cn: 他人走远了，但他响亮的声音仍在我耳际回荡。

sentences.en: In my ears the grieved shouts still resound.
sentences.cn: 撕心裂肺的呼喊还在我的耳旁。
